translation.en: - [man] I'm here. - [exhaling] Jonas.
- Yes, my love. - [sobs] It hurts.
- I know. - [panting]
I need medicine.
I'm sorry, my love, there's no more time.
It has to be now.
[gasping sobs] Not ready. I'm too weak.
None of us were ever as strong as you.
I don't want anyone else to die because of me.
translation.ko: 나 때문에 또 누가 죽는 건 싫어

translation.en: They'll be hunted... born or unborn.
- [groans] - You can give them a fighting chance.
translation.ko: 당신이 싸울 기회를 줄 수 있어

translation.en: [whispers] I see them.
You did it.
Protect them.
They're here.
- [tires screech outside] - So is he.
- Fight him. - I can't.
So this is how you've been hiding from me?
translation.ko: 지금껏 이런 식으로 숨어 있었던 거군?

translation.en: Does he know?
You're giving birth.
It's painful. I can feel it.
Whatever he's saying, remember what he has done.
translation.ko: 뭐라고 하든 그자가 한 짓을 기억해

translation.en: - [woman] Go. - Is that Jonas?
Please.
Tell him I'm looking forward to meeting him.
I love you.
- I love you. - Aw, does he know you're lying?
Stop.
Or is that still our little secret?
Angelica.
I-- I can't do it... not if you're here.
translation.ko: 난 못 해 당신 없인 못 해

translation.en: I will always be here...
just as you will always be here.
Oh, come now, my dear,
how many times have you made that threat?
translation.ko: 이제 그런 협박은 지칠 때도 됐는데?

translation.en: - And we both know you won't do it. - [gasping breaths]
translation.ko: 안 할 거란 거 다 알아

translation.en: You can't.
You are one of us, and there's still so much work to be done.
translation.ko: 넌 우리와 같아 아직 할 일이 많이 남았지

translation.en: - You're coming home, with me. - [door opens]
No.
- Give me the gun. - Put the gun down.
No. [sniffles]
Stop her!
[girl whispers] Will, help me.
Will...
help me.
Please.
[whispers] Help me.
OK.
Hello?
Hello? It's your neighbor.
Hey, open up! This is the police!
She can spin for a girl, can't she?
She can spin.
Period.
Sure.
I don't care. I didn't dress for you. I dressed for what is actually cool--
translation.ko: 너한테 잘 보이려고 입은 옷 아니니 상관 마

translation.en: Oh, hey, baby. Oh, hey... that set was on fire, man.
Yeah, the vibe was crackin', Riles.
It was like a... like a tight leash around me goolies.
Seen a lot of people play here. It doesn't feel like that.
translation.ko: 여기 자주 왔는데 그런 공연은 처음이에요

translation.en: - Thank you. - This is the guy I was telling you about.
Everybody calls me Nyx.
Gotta come with us, man. The shit that he has got
has got the power to blow our fuckin' brains out. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 완전 뻑 가는 물건을 갖고 있대

translation.en: - Sorry, really bad migraine. - I get it. All that energy and emotion.
translation.ko: - 난 두통이 심해서 - 그런 공연을 했으니까요

translation.en: Tell him about your freak out in the park.
translation.ko: 공원에서 약 빤 얘기 한번 해봐

translation.en: - Jacks, you fuckin' dick. - No, it's cool, man. Nyx, he gets it.
translation.ko: - 잭스, 이 나쁜 자식 - 괜찮아, 이해할 사람이야

translation.en: He said you had a vision.
No, it was too many drugs.
My son?
Tino! Don't do this. Don't do this, I beg of you!
I love you! I love you!
- It's too late. - Tino.
Have you come to confess your sins, my son?
No, Padre.
I've come to blow your fucking brains out.
What?
I'm sorry, are we going off script?
Padre, take five.
Lito, what is going on with you?
Yesterday, you were having visions
- of suicidal angels... - I'm sorry.
...and today you can't remember your lines.
[softly] Are you OK, baby?
I don't know. I'm not feeling myself today.
I don't need you to be yourself.
I need you to be this guy, Tino El Caído.
- Right. - El Caído.
- Right, right. OK. - El Caído, cabrón!
- Let's do it. - OK, people!
Let's set up for the close-up right here!
[woman over intercom] Ms. Bak, your brother's assistant called.
She said he still wasn't here, and Mr. Yuen has just arrived.
I'll meet Mr. Yuen in the conference room.
Ni hao, Mr. Yuen.
You do us a great service with your presence this morning.
- Who are you? - I'm Sun Bak,
Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
Ahh. The sister. Where is your brother?
He was... unavoidably detained.
But I will be happy to walk you through our proposal.
Look, I'm here to close.
Women don't close things.
They open them.
Excuse me?
[voice echoes] If Joong-Ki is not here, that means Bak is not ready to--
Tan-Wu! [chuckles] You sly old fox.
Did I see you at Min-Ji's? [continues indistinctly]
Hey, sis, go get us a couple coffees.
Come this way.
My nieces come downstairs, two little birds,
they climb onto the couch, and cuddle up in my arms.
Now we're close and all, but we've never done nothing like this in their lives.
translation.ko: 지금이야 친하지만 그땐 전혀 안 친했거든

translation.en: We didn't know it yet, but that exact moment,
my sister was at the supermarket, and she started bleeding bad.
translation.ko: 누나가 마트에서 피를 흘리기 시작했던 거야

translation.en: Something internal. There was blood everywhere,
and they had to call an ambulance, but my nieces knew.
translation.ko: 구급차 부르고 난리였는데 조카들이 그걸 느낀 거야

translation.en: - They knew about my sister. - Knew.
Somehow they just knew she was in trouble.
translation.ko: 엄마가 곤경에 처한 걸 감지한 거지

translation.en: Limbic resonance.
It's a language older than our species.
He thinks that's what happened to you in the park,
translation.ko: 자기가 공원에서 겪은 일도 그런 거래

translation.en: and it's all got to do with this chemical, DMT.
[Nyx] It's a simple molecule present in all living things.
Scientists talk about it being part of an eco-biological synaptic network.
translation.ko: 과학자들은 환경 생물학적 시냅스망의 일부로 보죠

translation.en: When people take it, they see their birth, their death, worlds beyond this one.
translation.ko: 그걸 통해 출생, 죽음 사후세계를 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: They talk of truth...
connection... transcendence.
Dad? Dad, where are the umbrellas? I can't find the umbrellas.
translation.ko: 아빠! 우산 어디 있어요? 안 보이네

translation.en: What do you need an umbrella for?
Please, no jokes. I'm late already.
I have a big meeting, and I can't show up dripping wet.
translation.ko: 중요한 회의인데 비 맞고 갈 순 없어요

translation.en: Umbrellas are upstairs, but you don't need one.
Look, the sun is shining. It's going to be a beautiful day.
But, I heard it.
Maybe you shouldn't be going to work. It's so close to the wedding.
translation.ko: 회사는 관두지 그러냐 곧 결혼도 할 거잖니

translation.en: - Dad, you know work is important to me. - I know.
You sent me to university to get a degree, not to find a husband.
translation.ko: 남편 만나라고 대학 보낸 거 아니잖아요

translation.en: - I know. - I heard thunder, and rain.
Maybe what you heard was the sound of your father's tears,
thinking how soon he is going to have to give his daughter away.
I thought you were happy I was getting married.
Tears can be happy... and sad.
We are born into this world the same way we shall leave it:
translation.ko: 홀로 세상에 태어나듯 우리는 세상을 떠나갑니다

translation.en: alone.
Our only comfort, the only presence that remains constant,
translation.ko: 우리의 유일한 위안은 언제나 함께하는 존재

translation.en: is the love of our Father in heaven.
You all right?
Migraine.
I'm like Grandpa Hassan up there.
Cold and pickled?
I dream big, like he did.
Nothing petty, like you two.
That's all you'll ever be, petty thieves. Not me.
My next score is gonna be huge. Legendary.
translation.ko: 내 다음 작품 기대해라 전설이 될 테니

translation.en: When you hear about it, your dicks are gonna shrivel.
I'm not sure what'll give me more pleasure... the money, or seeing his face.
translation.ko: 뭐가 더 고소하려나? 돈 맛? 아님 저놈 표정?

translation.en: My son.
Why are you so good to me?
You are my one and only mother.
You gave me the light and love in my heart.
I have to go.
Goodbye, my zebra.
I have this feeling.
I'm going to have a really good day today.
"When the streets are a jungle, there can only be one king."
[woman moaning] Oh, God.
Yeah. Oh, God.
Good?
- [chuckles] - Did that help honey's headache?
I can't answer that,
because you literally just fucked my brains out.
translation.ko: 홍콩 갔다 왔으니 뇌가 정상은 아닌 것 같아

translation.en: And here I always thought that was a figurative expression.
translation.ko: 정상이 아니라니 표현 참 말 되네

translation.en: - Happy Pride. - Happy Pride.
Oh... come on.
It's Shawn. He's asking if I can work the charity box at the show tonight!
translation.ko: 숀이야! 오늘 밤 쇼에서 자선 박스 할 수 있냐고

translation.en: - I sense a costume opportunity. - Ah-- It's for a good cause.
Who are you?
Who am I?
Blow your fucking brains out.
Where's that coming from?
Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
Who am I? I'm Tino El Caído.
I'm the fallen one.
And you're a liar. You're a liar.
I'm Tino El Caído.
I'm Tino El Caído. I'm the fallen one.
Diet Coke, please!
What happened in my past nobody knows, not the writers, not the directors.
translation.ko: 내 과거는 아무도 몰라 작가도, 감독도 몰라

translation.en: I'm a man-- Bah! Bah-pah!
A man with a haunted past, that's what the script says.
translation.ko: 과거에 사로잡힌 남자 대본에 나온 대로

translation.en: [sighing] What are you doing to me?
- [knocking at door] - Yeah?
Hey.
Hey.
Just checking everything is OK.
Yeah.
- Yeah? - Everything's OK.
I just thought maybe I did something wrong.
No, no. Please, no. You were great. You were fantastic.
It was me that, you know, I...
You're just always so perfect.
I don't know what is going on with me.
Maybe there's something that I can help you with?
Wait, wait.
Wait, Cassandra.
There is nothing I'd like more.
If only my heart did not belong to another.
translation.ko: 내 마음은 다른 사람한테 가 있어

translation.en: I'm sorry.
- [sighs] - She's a very lucky woman.
I'm sorry. I...
I'm sorry.
Thank you for coming. It means a lot to us.
Sorry, Auntie.
Last few days, all he talked about was your father.
translation.ko: 돌아가시기 전에 네 아버지 얘기만 하셨다

translation.en: Saddest day in his life, the day your father died.
translation.ko: 네 아버지를 잃은 날이 가장 슬픈 날이셨단다

translation.en: You should go say hello. We'll wait for you.
Pay your respects. He was your father.
- Yes? - When are we leaving?
- Right now. - I have to be downtown by nine.
You'll be there long before nine, Ma'am.
Come rain or shine, Van Damn is always on time.
- We need to go. - We need more customers.
We're barely covering the cost of gas.
We don't need customers, we need a Facebook page.
- Look at this. - [sighs] Jela.
Every day is the same. Everybody loves Bat Van.
You dumb fucks! No one gives a shit about Van Damn!
- Maybe he's right. - No.
- Maybe Jean-Claude's time is over. - No! Never!
Come on, Capheus, Van Damme is a man.
translation.ko: 왜 이래? 카피우스 반담이 진짜 남자지!

translation.en: He doesn't need costumes and gadgets to fight.
translation.ko: 쫄바지 입고 싸우는 게 무슨 남자냐?

translation.en: He fights with the fist and with his heart.
Come on! The Muscles from Brussels never die.
Don't forget that.
- Come on. - [speaks foreign language]
- And get us more customers. - I will.
- [man] Excuse me. - Whoo! [laughs]
Jean Claude is watching over us. Yes, sir, are you going to the city?
translation.ko: 장 끌로드의 힘인가 봐 시내로 가시나요?

translation.en: - Yes, please. - Then take a seat.
- No, but I've got no money. - Um... Everyone must pay.
translation.ko: - 실은 돈이 없어요 - 돈은 내야 돼요

translation.en: - Here. - What am I supposed to do with this?
This is worth more than the fare.
Look, I believe you, but how do I return change out of a chicken?
- Save me an egg. - [chicken squawking]
[woman] Ms. Bak, I have Mr. Jong from Seoul Citibank on the line again.
translation.ko: 부사장님, 서울 시티뱅크 쪽에서 또 전화 왔습니다

translation.en: [Sun] Tell Mr. Jong that I'm in a meeting.
Hang on. Riley! Hey!
Me and Nocker have been waitin' for you.
Sorry. I thought you'd gone already.
Nyx has invited us up to his place.
Oh, look, maybe tomorrow, OK?
Riles, this is important.
Look, this headache is killing me.
Tomorrow, OK?
OK...
The stuff that he's talking about, that is exactly what you need.
translation.ko: 저자가 말한 거 자기한테 꼭 필요한 거야

translation.en: - Hi! - Remember your first brownie?
Our first Pride.
Your lips... are so... amazing.
My God, we were so high.
- [both giggling] - Oh, my God, we were.
- Need some delicious, nutritious stuff? - Um...
translation.ko: 맛 좋고 영양가 높은 거 어때요?

translation.en: Maybe this is what you need.
- [man] Yeah. - OK, OK, we'll take one.
- [man 2] Go for it. - How much?
You'll never be the same again.
- OK, OK. OK, OK. - Thank you very much.
Happy journey.
- Happy Pride! - Happy Pride!
Bye!
But you know what I remember best about that day?
translation.ko: 그날 어떤 게 가장 좋았는지 알아?

translation.en: Hey, y'all, this is the one I've been talking about.
Wait, I know you. You're the tranny that blogs about politics.
I totally disagree with what you said about dropping LGBT.
- Hey, come on, relax. It's a party. - We fought hard for that recognition.
translation.ko: - 왜 이래? 파티잖아 - 힘들게 얻어낸 권리라고

translation.en: I just thought that the distinctions were separating us.
Bullshit. Just another colonizing male trying to take up any space left to women.
translation.ko: 웃기네, 거시기 떼고 여자 자리나 넘보는 주제에

translation.en: Sam, say one more thing about my girlfriend
and I will colonize your face with my fist.
- Oh, yeah? - I'm gonna go.
Oh, please. She's a loud-mouth Berkeley bitch.
- Fuck you. - Fuck you!
Hey, No-- Nomi!
Wait! Honey, what is it? You never cry at stuff like that.
translation.ko: 노미! 이런 일로 우는 사람 아니잖아?

translation.en: I'm not crying because of her.
Then what?
I'm crying because no one's ever defended me before.
translation.ko: 누가 내 편 들어주는 거 처음이거든

translation.en: That's the day I knew I'd always love you.
translation.ko: 그날 널 영원히 사랑하게 될 걸 알았지

translation.en: My Lord Ganesha.
I hope you like this modak.
I made it especially for you.
I put peanuts on top. [chuckles]
I mean, of course, these gifts come without any attachments or obligations.
translation.ko: 뭐 바라는 게 있어서 뇌물 드리는 거 아녜요

translation.en: I am trying to become a better person.
I know I am not important enough to deserve your attention
translation.ko: 제가 가네샤님의 관심을 끌 만한 사람은 아니겠죠

translation.en: when there are so many terrible things wrong in this world.
translation.ko: 세상엔 끔찍한 일도 많이 일어나고 있으니까요

translation.en: I can't tell you how bad I feel even being here,
translation.ko: 여기 온 것 자체도 죄송한 기분이에요

translation.en: because I know I shouldn't be asking you this.
translation.ko: 이런 걸 물으면 안 될 테니까요

translation.en: But I have no one else to turn to.
OK, um... this weekend,
I am to marry a very important man, who you probably know, Rajan Rasal.
translation.ko: 권위 있는 사람과 결혼해요 라잔 라살 아시죠?

translation.en: Um, he is the son of the owner of the pharmaceutical company where I work.
translation.ko: 제가 일하는 제약 회사 사장 아들이에요

translation.en: He's very smart and very handsome,
and all the women at the company want desperately to marry him,
translation.ko: 회사 여자들 모두 결혼하고 싶어 하는 남잔데

translation.en: but he never took an interest in anyone... except me.
translation.ko: 다른 덴 눈길도 안 주고 저만 바라봐요

translation.en: I should tell you, I have never seen my parents so full of joy
translation.ko: 우리 가족이 그렇게 기뻐하는 건 처음 봤어요

translation.en: as when they received his proposal.
I mean, I thought they were excited when I received my degree from university.
translation.ko: 제가 학위를 받았을 때보다 더 기뻐했죠

translation.en: Maybe you saw my dad, like, dancing around the house.
How could I say no?
I mean, Rajan is, according to everyone, including my mom's astrologer,
translation.ko: 엄마의 점성술사를 포함해 모든 사람이 말하길

translation.en: the perfect husband for me.
Except for one little fact.
I do not love him.
After you left the funeral... Sergei started blowing on about your dad.
translation.ko: 너 나가고 세르게이가 네 아빠 얘기를 했는데

translation.en: Said there wasn't a better box man in the world than your dad, now or ever.
Said the only reason your dad got caught
was because he was obsessed with trying to crack an S&D safe.
translation.ko: S&D 금고 여는 데 너무 집착하다 그런 거래

translation.en: Said they're uncrackable.
Said your father was an idiot for trying.
You sure that gets us in?
Am I sure? You notice the sign outside?
See you tomorrow.
Wolfgang?
The safe in the house, it's one of them S&D's, isn't it?
translation.ko: 그 집에 있는 금고 S&D 꺼 맞지?

translation.en: - [dance music playing] - Give 'til it hearts, baby. My box needs filling!
translation.ko: 아플 때까지 넣어줘요! 속이 꽉 차게!

translation.en: Mm, thank you, baby.
Hi!
- Oh! - Wow, she is amazing.
Neets loves her charity work.
- Thanks for coming. - Oh, my God, of course.
- We're so excited to see your new piece. - A bit nervous about it, actually.
translation.ko: - 새 작품 정말 기대돼 - 실은 좀 긴장된다

translation.en: - Why? - Well, it's kind of a downer.
- So? - This is Pride. People want to feel good.
I don't.
During the '80s, Pride was a funeral march.
I know. I want to remember that. I want to connect to that.
I want to show people how my life and all of this
translation.ko: 사람들에게 내 인생과 지금 이 모든 게

translation.en: is made possible by those lives and those deaths.
[man] I walked in the room and saw a man in his early 30s
who looked like he was 92,
who was skin and bones, who weighed maybe 80 pounds,
who was on a respirator.
[sighs] And, uh... [voice breaking] and he said, he said to me...
"Do me this-- You've gotta do me a favor."
And I said, "Whatever it is, just ask."
And he said, "I can't go on like this."
He said, "You know, I just-- If you could, just carry me up to the roof
and throw me over the... roof."
He goes, "I only weigh about 80 pounds, and you're strong, you could do it."
translation.ko: '난 35kg밖에 안 나가니 안고 갈 수 있을 거요'

translation.en: And then I said, "Jay, I can't do that. You can't ask that of me."
And when he died, they came in... in hazmat... [voice breaks] suits,
translation.ko: 그가 죽자, 사람들은 차단복을 입고 들어와

translation.en: and they put him in a body bag.
It's like I was there.
I could feel the wind coming in through the broken windows.
The smell of burnt mattress. It didn't seem like a dream.
translation.ko: 불탄 매트리스 냄새도 나고 꿈같지가 않았어

translation.en: Maybe you were astro-projecting, like Dr. Strange.
Why would I expect anything different from you?
- Officer Strange. - Fuck off.
Officer Strange. Whoo! That's your name.
Every time I come down here,
I remember how much you can actually feel how much they hate us.
Gangbangers hate cops, cops hate gangbangers. It's natural.
translation.ko: 갱이랑 경찰이 서로 싫어하는 건 당연한 거야

translation.en: How's that natural?
Like dogs hate cats. They're the enemy.
You certainly got plenty of reason to hate them.
After what they did to your old man?
Shit, I'd never forgive something like that.
[man over radio] One-Adam-12, we have a report of gunfire.
Eleven-12, 10-4.
With any luck, there'll be a few less cats in the world.
translation.ko: 운 좋으면 세상에 고양이가 좀 줄어들겠지

translation.en: - Let's get 'em, cowboy. - [siren wailing]
Open sesame.
Was that a siren?
Huh? Didn't hear anything.
You know I brought a drill.
There's no shame in drilling.
Shots fired. Requesting backup.
Help me.
- [man] What happened? - [boy panting]
Gunshot wound. Looks like a hollow point.
- Get an ambulance. - What?
- You heard me. - What do you think this is, TV?
Ain't no ambulance coming to Chi-raq for a gunshot.
translation.ko: 총상이라고 시라크에 구급차가 올 줄 알아?

translation.en: Not fast enough to make a difference anyway.
The fuck you doing, Gorski?
Hey. What's your name, kid?
- Deshawn. - Deshawn, I'm Will.
I need you to press this as hard as you can.
translation.ko: 여기를 있는 힘껏 꽉 누르고 있어

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey. Press as hard as you can.
- Are you kidding me? - [Will grunts]
I know you, Diego. You do not want to stand there and let this kid die either.
translation.ko: 너도 애가 죽게 내버려 두고 싶진 않잖아

translation.en: That's what he'd do if it was you or me.
Goddamnit.
Fifty-eight minutes.
Fuck.
Hey, hey, hey. Hey.
What's this?
We're throwing in the towel?
I need a break.
Hey, you understand we got less than an hour,
unless I'm wrong and Steiner's early, then we got less than that.
translation.ko: 슈타이너가 더 일찍 올 수도 있고

translation.en: You're never wrong about shit like that.
- [dance music plays on TV] - [audience cheers]
Really?
[whispers] Really?
It relaxes me.
This shit relaxes you?
- Hang on. - [tires screeching]
- [Will] You OK? - Just a little cold.
[boy] This your first time in the back seat, Will?
I've been back here more times than I care to admit.
[groans] Are you some sort of gangsta cop or somethin'?
Old man's police. Had my fair share of teenage rebellion, I guess.
translation.ko: 아버지가 경찰인데 십대 때 반항 좀 했지

translation.en: Never met my dad. He was shot before I was born.
translation.ko: 난 아빠 본 적 없어요 태어나기 전에 총 맞았대요

translation.en: This girl, she's really good.
Her name's Natalie. I watched her last week.
She sings like a musical instrument.
She uses a language of pure emotion.
Yeah, yeah, she's good.
- She's never gonna win. - Why?
Her eyes are too close together. She looks like a camel.
translation.ko: 눈이 너무 몰렸어 낙타 같이 생겼잖아

translation.en: [Wolfgang] Shut up.
Camel's never gonna win.
Never.
- [low murmurs in audience] - [woman whispers] Wolfgang.
[woman whispers] Wolfgang.
- [sighs] - Told you.
Emergency! Kid's bleeding bad here.
- That's a gunshot. - Yeah, I know.
- I'm sorry, we can't treat that here. - What?
Are you new? You need to go and get an ambulance and take him to Mt. Sinai.
translation.ko: 신참이신가? 총상은 Mt. 시나이 병원으로 가야죠

translation.en: The kid's gonna be dead before we get there.
- I'm sorry. It's policy. - What kind of policy lets a kid die?
translation.ko: - 미안하지만 정책이 그래요 - 무슨 정책이 그따위죠?

translation.en: We were losing so many resources to gunshots,
translation.ko: 총상 환자들 때문에 병원 자원이 낭비돼서

translation.en: we couldn't take care of all the other patients that needed help around here.
We've been a better hospital since we stopped taking kids like him.
translation.ko: 이런 애들을 무시하면서 더 좋은 병원이 됐죠

translation.en: - [boy panting] - [Will] Please.
Please.
That's it.
Fuck. It's over. Hey.
Shit.
It's Steiner! We gotta go.
Hey, Wolfgang.
Please.
He's going to fucking kill us.
I don't want to die!
- You cracked the uncrackable. - [sighs]
You did it.
Yeah.
OK.
Dr. Manno just came out of surgery. Life signs are stable.
translation.ko: 수술 방금 끝났습니다 바이탈 사인도 안정적이고

translation.en: He'll probably make it.
OK.
Thanks.
Can I ask you a personal question?
If he lives and he kills someone, let's say a cop,
translation.ko: 저 애가 살아서 경찰을 죽인다 칩시다

translation.en: how you gonna feel about that?
You all right?
You're sweating.
- Your pulse is racing. - I'm fine.
You're scared.
You needn't be.
You're so beautiful.
I don't just mean in a physical way.
The warmth... pouring out of your heart.
Even though you work hard to hide it.
You don't belong with these men.
You know it's true.
Don't you?
I used to be like you.
Like an exposed nerve of a broken tooth.
translation.ko: 부러진 이빨 밑으로 드러난 신경 같았죠

translation.en: I used anything I could to insulate.
Music... books... booze.
Anything I could to keep myself separate from the rest of the world.
translation.ko: 세상으로부터 멀어지게 해줄 만한 건 뭐든지요

translation.en: Eventually I felt protected, you know, I...
I felt safe.
But also...
I never felt so... completely alone.
Then one day a friend, she gave me a gift.
She took away my armor.
She tore down my walls.
Her gift... it reminded me
what it felt like... to be alive.
What did she give you?
This.
- Stop the car. - Hm?
- I said stop the car! - What the fuck?
This is where it happened.
What happened?
It's where she killed herself.
[mutters] Shit.
This is it.
Ah, hell no.
This wasn't a dream.
Of all the partners, I end up with a Mulder-wannabe.
translation.ko: 하필 멀더 요원이랑 짝이 될 게 뭐람

translation.en: - D, a woman killed herself right here. - Where's the blood, Will?
Maybe she only shot herself in the fifth dimension,
so we can't see the blood.
OK, I've never been here before.
I know about this.
Drugs.
There's a gun, too.
There's shit everywhere, man.
Look, you're freakin' me out.
Show me evidence of a crime, and you got me.
So, until then, do your little séance, and I'll be in the car. All right?
translation.ko: 그럼 접신 잘해 봐 난 차 안에 가 있을게

translation.en: Uh... Hi.
This is where she died.
Did you know her?
How do you know she died here?
I saw her.
Do you live here?
Where do you live?
London.
What are you doing here?
I don't know.
I don't know where I am.
Chicago, near South Side.
In America?
I've never been to America.
[gasps] Oh, no! What are you doing?
- Don't you fucking move! - [gasping]
- Stop. - Open the fucking safe!
Why are you doing this?
He has just had a shipment come in, and me and Nocker have been trackin' it.
translation.ko: 노커랑 내가 쫓던 걸 이자가 넘겨받았어

translation.en: We were gonna hit him yesterday, but he wanted you here.
translation.ko: 어제 치려고 했는데 네가 있어야 한다잖아

translation.en: Now, a smart guy like you... probably has a gun in there.
translation.ko: 너 정도 똘똘이라면 여기 총을 뒀겠지

translation.en: - [gasps] Don't hurt him. - Oh, yeah.
Is that why you came? 'Cause you wanna-- Do you wanna fuck him?
translation.ko: 이놈이랑 자고 싶어서 여기까지 온 거지?

translation.en: Riles, he will kill you without blinking if I didn't have this.
translation.ko: 이 자식은 눈 하나 깜빡 안 하고 널 죽였을걸?

translation.en: - I fuckin' told you. Here. - I have to go.
translation.ko: - 내 말 맞지? 받아 - 나 갈래

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Riley. You're not-- You're not going anywhere.
translation.ko: 아니, 아니, 안 되지 어딜 가시려고

translation.en: - You're part of this. No, no, no. - [panting] Let me go.
Riles, Riles... this is the break that we've been waiting for.
Fill it up.
Fill it up!
Riles, this is our chance.
You said that you wanted to go to America. We wanted a different life.
translation.ko: 미국에 가고 싶다며? 새로운 삶을 원했잖아?

translation.en: That's-- That's what you said, right?
